snippet.title: Undernauts: Labyrinth of Yomi - Official Trailer (Various Platforms)
snippet.description:
Tokyo. 1979. 
When a massive, mysterious structure suddenly rises from the ground, the government sends a team to investigate. A new generation of explorers flock to the colossal superstructure, Yomi, in hopes of striking the "mother lode".  You have been selected to join an elite group of underground explorers employed by Cassandra Company. Unfortunately, you are not the only one searching these caverns. 

Terrifying monsters lurk in the shadows. Dangerous criminals hunt for resources. Large numbers of people are missing. 

Cut through the walls and create your own path as you battle for your life in the depths of Yomi.

The ultimate test for survival is found in the labyrinth. Terrifying monsters lurk in the shadows. Criminals with mysterious powers are out to thwart your efforts. Can you be victorious and rise above the shadows?

The test of your survival skills begins now...

For more information on this title and to pre-order visit: https://store.aksysgames.com/collections/preorder-now

To stay up to date on all the news, follow Aksys Games on Twitter and Instagram at @AksysGames, and join our Thursday livestreams on Twitch at AksysGames, with stream highlights and trailers on our YouTube channel.

About Aksys Games
One of the Top 10 Metacritic Publishers of 2020, Aksys Games Localization, Inc. is a visionary video game publisher committed to publishing unique and high-quality interactive content for all current-generation platforms since 2006. Its lineup of games includes the wildly successful BlazBlue, Under Night In-Birth, and Guilty Gear franchises, Little Dragons Café, the award-winning Spirit Hunter: Death Mark and Spirit Hunter: NG adventures and Code: Realize titles. More information about Aksys Games and its unique products can be found on the company’s website, www.aksysgames.com.
